channel.title: Help, I need to know what .java this code goes. People say different things!
channel.description:
I have all the bonuses set for the armor, but players still hit just as often on other players as they would without armor. How can I make armour make people actually hit less often?
Oh and which .java do i modify? People are saying client.java otheres player.java or playerhander etc. So which one?
Thanks for taking the time to read ;D

item.title: Help, I need to know what .java this code goes. People say different things!
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

oh now i get ya
if(playerEquiptment[playerChest] >= 0) {
otherplayer.wepdelay / playerBonus[6];
otherplayer.wepdelay / playerBonus[6];
}

somthing liek that put it in boolean attack and edit it till it works for you might need a try and catch statement

Read full topic
